extendedInfo.description: This is ad-supported lite version of "Toggle Settings | Profiles""Powerful Android utility" ~Andronicia.com"The control tower for your Android" ~Andronavi.com"Easy to use." ~Avin"By far my most often used app." ~PaulWith Toggle Settings you can create complex event based rules, easily manage you device settings with profiles and quickly toggle/change system settings. App also give quick access using notification bar, a process panel to view running tasks and many other features. Right now app supports location based, incoming & outgoing calls based, time based, date & time, battery events, charger events, car/desk dock events, headset events, bluetooth events and wifi events based rules. In new version you can add conditions to your event based rules.Full feature list: * 12 customizable profiles * RuleSets to define set of rules applicable on selected days or during given dates * Rules with start event, start conditions and end events* Supports 'and', 'or' and 'not' operator in conditions* Monitors system for 11 different events - location, incoming & outgoing calls, time, date & time, battery events, charger events, car/desk dock events, headset events, bluetooth events and wifi events * Rule conditions based on 18 different system states * 10 toggles to quickly turn important system settings on and off - Airplane mode, APN data, Auto sync, bluetooth, fast bright, orientation, screen never timesout, silent mode, portable hotspot and usb tethering * Shortcuts to other major system settings - Brightness, ringtone, volume controls and ringer mode * Task Manager to view list of running tasks * Ignore list for tasks * Quick access through notification bar * Backup and restore capability * Battery status * Memory status * Supports 6 languages - English, Japanese, French, German, Chinese and SpanishWe are working on many new features. Custom actions are next.

reviews.title: Opens!
reviews.comment: Tries to launch, stops responding within 2 seconds; does not let me past the main screen to choose profile. Tried five times. First attempt stopped responding immediately upon first attempt to open app (but may have been due to disabled mobile data).  Google Nexus S, Android 4.1.2 (jellybean?)  Not worth my time.
reviews.author: Chris Lee

reviews.title: Not working - ZTE San Francisco
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t toggle between profiles. Always stayed on Home profile, and loud ring tone annoyed everyone at work, had to remove.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow I haven\'t downloaded this app since a long time, its not great. Why can\'t the add be in the settings part?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes upon open
reviews.comment: App crashes as soon as its opened. Tried resetting phone, no avail. HTC sensation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow, REALLY!?!
reviews.comment: Force closed the first 3 times I tried to open it. Then once it opened, force closed another 3 or 4 times. Do better. (GS3 4.1.2)
reviews.author: Stephanie Carter

reviews.comment: Good concept, interface takes time to work out. Free version allows only one rule, so you need to buy full version to get any real power from it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good app, don\'t switch between gsm & cdma. after removal detected that battery dies in 3 hours after full charge. reinstalling to rollback and remov
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on JB
reviews.comment: The app crashes as soon as it is launched. Galaxy Nexus + Jelly Bean 4.1.1 stock
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: volume get increase even set it low
reviews.comment: not good for my galaxy y. the volume get increase even i set it low that makes my ears hurt (the music volume) :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Droid DNA.
reviews.comment: Crashes while losing every time...
reviews.author: Dan Bidwell

reviews.comment: Unable to control one volume setting at a time and doesn\'t allow adding new profiles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hang when changing profile
reviews.comment: Great app like it very much, but when changing profile it keep lodging and hang..thus have to restart every time when I need to change profile..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It keeps getting stuck on \"applying profile\" AFTER exiting the app. Not a reliable app at all. Lousy UI. Check out MyProfiles, is excellent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome concept, but hardly ever works. most of the time it just says \"applying profile\" without actually ever doing so. tried reinstalling, no go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works in ICS
reviews.comment: I used this app religiously. Works wonderfully for me and was one of my first installs.... however it no longer works in ICS or the Galaxy Nexus. I hope this is fixed soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Difficult to set preferences
reviews.comment: Pros - Has an option to include/change all settings - Rule Engine - Timed  Cons - Very difficult to scroll thru the app - No profile rename option  Had to uninstall finally
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Could you please fix the constant crashing on the Galaxy Nexus. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the app, but not latest update. Hate having it in \"ongoing\" notifications bar all the time. Please allow removal of that via settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best utility on my phone. Handles several settings with one selection; Plus it\'ll kick itself back to the previous setting accorxing to WHEN I tell it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT wrkin..mobile crashes and restarts if opend
